at.qe.timeguess.services

Class ExpressionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.services.ExpressionService

  • @Service
 @Scope(value="application")
public class ExpressionService
extends Object
    This class represents the Service with which Expressions get managed. It is possible to create, import with JSON file, delete Expressions, and to find Expression by specific properties as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExpressionService.ExpressionAlreadyExistsException
      Gets thrown when an Expression is tried to be created, which already exists
      class  ExpressionService.ExpressionDoesNotExistAnymoreException
      Gets thrown when an Expression is tried to be deleted, which does not exist anymore
      class  ExpressionService.ExpressionReferencedInGameException
      Gets thrown when an Expression is tried to be deleted, which referenced in a completed game

      ExpressionService()

      • getExpressionById

        Returns:

        public Expression getExpressionByCategoryAndName(Category category,
                                                 String name)
        Returns a Expression which is searched by its Category and name
        Parameters:
        category - the Category in which the Expression is in
        name - the name of the Expression
        Returns:
        the Expression with corresponding name and Category

      • getAllExpressionsByCategory

        public Collection<Expression> getAllExpressionsByCategory(Category category)
        Returns all Expressions of a given Category
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Return a random Expression of a Category

        Returns:
        a random Expression of a Category

      • saveExpression

        public ExpressionDTO saveExpression(Long categoryId,
                                    NameDTO nameDTO)
                             throws ExpressionService.ExpressionAlreadyExistsException
        Saves an Expression in the database
        Parameters:
        categoryId - the ID of the Category to which the Expression gets assigned
        nameDTO - contains the name of the Expression
        Returns:
        an ExpressionDTO with the information of the saved Expression
        Throws:
        ExpressionService.ExpressionAlreadyExistsException - if the Expression already exists in the Category

      • importExpressionsIntoCategory

        public List<ExpressionDTO> importExpressionsIntoCategory(Long categoryId,
                                                         Collection<String> expressionNames)
        Imports Expressions into the database and assigns them to a given Category, if there Expressions to import, which already exist in the database, they get ignored, thus no duplicates are being created
        Parameters:
        categoryId - the ID of the Category to which the Expressions get assigned
        expressionNames - the names of the Expressions to be imported
        Returns:
        the Collection of the imported Expressions

      • importExpressions

        public List<CategoryExpressionDTO> importExpressions(Collection<CategoryExpressionAsStringsDTO> categoryExpressionAsStringsDTOs)
        Imports Expressions of multiple Categories and creates Categories if required Category does not exist already
        Parameters:
        categoryExpressionAsStringsDTOs - Pairs of (Category, Expression[]) to get imported
        Throws:
        CategoryService.CategoryAlreadyExistsException - if the Category to get created already exists

      • deleteExpression

        public void deleteExpression(Expression expression)
                      throws ExpressionService.ExpressionDoesNotExistAnymoreException
        Deletes an Expression
        Parameters:
        expression - the Expression to be deleted
        Throws:
        ExpressionService.ExpressionDoesNotExistAnymoreException - if the Expression to get deleted does not exist anymore
